title: The Whispering Page
description: A book in the library is actively rewriting itself and the person reading it...

turns.narrative: The settlement library is haunted by a 'Whispering-Page'—a sheet of paper that reads itself out loud in a voice of paper-cuts.
turns.convergence: The book is a 'History of the Scourge' that is 'Correcting' itself in real-time. The smell is of old parchment and ink.

turns.narrative: The ink is 'Living-Script'—it’s crawling off the page and trying to write a 'New-Story' on your own skin.
turns.choice_b: Allow the script to finish (Wis DC 14)
turns.convergence: The script reveals a 'Secret-Passage' behind the 'Law-Section'.

turns.narrative: A 'Book-Wyrm'—a creature of paper-scales and leather-wings—is eating the 'Forgotten-Lore' in the restricted section.
turns.convergence: The Wyrm burps a 'Cinder-Shard' and vanishes into the vents. You find a 'Lost-Page' on the floor.

turns.narrative: The 'Librarian'—a woman in glasses made of 'Void-Glass'—is frantic. 'The books... they’re rewriting the laws of gravity!' she cries.
turns.convergence: The books begin to float, forming a 'Spiral-Staircase' of knowledge into the ceiling-void.

turns.narrative: A 'Script-Geist'—a spirit made of floating letters—appears, trying to 'Edit' you out of reality using a 'Eraser-Staff'.
turns.convergence: The Geist reveals he’s the 'Spirit of Truth' who has been 'Censored' by the Council. (+1 Secret)

turns.narrative: You must decide: 'Submit' to the edit or 'Rewrite' the spirit. The air is thick with the smell of wet ink and old dust.
turns.convergence: The Geist dissolves into a cloud of 'Ink-Dust'. The library returns to a state of 'Stable-Gravity'.

turns.narrative: The Librarian gives you a 'Bookmark of Holding'—it can save your place in any dimension.
turns.convergence: The bookmark is made of red silk and never frays. It’s a 'Logic-Anchor'.

turns.narrative: The 'Whispering Page' is quiet, but it’s now a 'Talking-Book'. It offers you advice on 'Forbidden-Lore' (+2 Intel).
turns.convergence: The sun sets, its light coloring the library's dust in shades of sepia and gold.

turns.narrative: As you leave, you feel like you've 'Read the Future'. You know a secret about a Council member’s past.
turns.convergence: The knowledge is heavy, but it grants you a +1 to 'Politics' permanently.

turns.narrative: Quest ends in the Library. The 'Whispering Page' is a story of hope tonight.

conclusion: The mission regarding 'The Whispering Page' is complete. Quest Complete.

risk_matrix.penalty: You are deleted from the story and your name is forgotten. (Quest Failed)
risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.

unlock_conditions.trigger: Settlement library reports a book actively rewriting itself overnight

permanent_effects.settlement: Library secured; Lost-Page archived as rare Lore item

branching_outcomes.result: Bookmark of Holding gained; wyrm contained
Lost-Page recovered; wyrm becomes recurring threat
